summary: This mod will allow You to learn all of sOys vampie perks at once
descriptionHtml:
This mod will allow You to learn all of sOys vampie perks at once

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22926

Instalation:
Just extract this archive into Your main folder of Skyrim 
Make sure Your Downguard LO is 02
and sOys perks are 8D
(You can simple check it and change if nessesary in nexus mod menager)
next lunch skyrim, load Your save and wrote in console [~]
\"bat vamp_perks\"

Simple and helpful
If helped endorse
author: Deniz
